original_title: Unicornio, el jardín de las frutas
overview: Filmed in India, it consists of five episodes. One, on transsexualism, including the sacrifice of a boy in a village inhabited by women; the next speaks of a white slave which the protagonist takes the money saved to buy a camel; the third refers to the adventure of an alchemist whose quest is not gold but eternity. The fourth deals with a caravan of life and in the fifth descends to hell with a colorful unleashed furies and other beings from the Greek tradition.
title: Unicornio, el jardín de las frutas
